latest_revision.text:
Formal proposals directed towards Hack Your Hackerspace meetings are to be made including to but not limited to: 

When tools or equipment outside normal operating budgets are to be considered.

When card access to the space is to be added to a member.

When installations, stations, or additions to the lab take up sizable floor space.

==List of some historic proposals:==

[https://groups.google.com/d/msg/heatsynclabs/xDnv6IW2RRo/ZSBMU0ki4HUJ 08/11/2011]Members voting directly on proposals including proposed use of lab space

[https://groups.google.com/d/msg/heatsynclabs/OM5bZC5QXDQ/SBMI_csJNK0J 08/11/2011]Going forward in order to receive a 24/7 access card a member's card access will need to be proposed and voted on at Hack Your Hackerspace meetings just like other space business

[https://groups.google.com/d/msg/heatsynclabs/hUQTCxdWsRU/oNdeqBsWYa4J 08/12/2011]Proposal: Change voting rules to require a quorum 

[https://groups.google.com/d/msg/heatsynclabs/MTPb1JmomLE/lGLgceuxxgYJ 02/11/2012]SyncStarter Proposal: one Ultimaker Complete Kit

[https://groups.google.com/d/msg/heatsynclabs/lY-M_Rl9fOE/tkmSjcAHYG0J 11/12/2012]Only people with card access can vote on granting card access

[https://groups.google.com/d/msg/heatsynclabs/OyZG0amZruw/kfphRSFEZXMJ 03/11/2014][Proposal] Buy 3 of these laptops to replenish our laptops 

[https://groups.google.com/d/msg/heatsynclabs/aZ28Nh2Mojc/iTgdfDc9ENIJ 01/08/2015]Proposal: buy an ultimaker 2 

[https://groups.google.com/d/msg/heatsynclabs/R4Q1wd4xgXs/x86CoP8vamYJ 02/19/2015][PROPOSAL] Purchase vinyl cutter (LaserPoint II Series)
